content: photos for each border leaf insert the first pin at the center leaf vein point and then use the other pins to secure the edges if desired use a pin to expand open the large eyelet hole near each pattern leaf allow shawl to dry unpin and enjoy 3 | p age 4 | p age gallery 5 | p age 6 | p age content copyright fragrant heart 2011 questions www fragrantheart com/blog 7 | p age
